          <title>
            <string language="en">Standing air waves</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Stehende Radiowellen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Vagues d'air debout</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ondas de ar eretas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Onde di aria diritte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μόνιμα κύματα αέρα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ondas de aire derechas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">These illustrations show standing wave patterns for air in a tube closed at one end.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">antinodes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">nodes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">standing wave</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">tube</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">wave patterns</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildungen Erscheinenstellung-Welle Muster
für Luft in einem Gefäß schlossen bei einem Ende.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ces configurations de vague de position 
d'exposition d'illustrations pour l'air dans un tube se sont fermées 
à une extrémité.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estes testes padrões da onda da posição da 
mostra das ilustrações para o ar em um tubo fecharam-se em uma 
extremidade.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questi modelli dell'onda di condizione di 
esposizione delle illustrazioni per aria in un tubo chiuso ad 
un'estremità.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτές οι απεικονίσεις εμφανίζουν μόνιμα πρότυπα 
κυμάτων για τον αέρα σε έναν σωλήνα κλειστό από τη μία πλευρά.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estos modelos de la onda de la situación de la 
demostración de las ilustraciones para el aire en un tubo se cerraron
en un extremo.</string>
          </description>
